/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their gray and white facades reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Cars of various colors are parked along the street, adding a vibrant touch to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the concrete jungle below. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting different parts of the city. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the details and textures of the cityscape.
